languages.text: "На моей планете набирался полк {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g}. Тысячи идиотов клюнули на комиссарскую болтовню про пайку и славный долг защиты {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Меня среди них, конечно же, не было. Но и тысяч добровольцев оказалось недостаточно".

traits.locale_text: "На моей планете набирался полк {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g}. Тысячи идиотов клюнули на комиссарскую болтовню про пайку и славный долг защиты {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Меня среди них, конечно же, не было. Но и тысяч добровольцев оказалось недостаточно".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "They were forming an {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} regiment on my planet. Thousands of morons bought the Commissars' groxshit about rations and the glorious duty that is protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I wasn't one of them, of course. However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."

However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “那群人在我那颗行星上组建了一支{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}军团。成千上万的白痴相信了政委的那套鬼话，说什么能分到足够的口粮，还说什么保护{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}是每个人的光荣职责之类的。当然，我根本没有加入他们，但他们很快就发现，仅仅是成千上万的志愿者，并不够用。”
languages.original_text: "They were forming an {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} regiment on my planet. Thousands of morons bought the Commissars' groxshit about rations and the glorious duty that is protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I wasn't one of them, of course. However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."

traits.locale_text: “那群人在我那颗行星上组建了一支{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}军团。成千上万的白痴相信了政委的那套鬼话，说什么能分到足够的口粮，还说什么保护{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}是每个人的光荣职责之类的。当然，我根本没有加入他们，但他们很快就发现，仅仅是成千上万的志愿者，并不够用。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「彼らは私がいた惑星に{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}の連隊を結成させようとしていました。配給を渡すだの、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}を守る輝かしい義務だの、コミッサーが吐く戯言を何千人もの愚か者が信じました。もちろん、私は信じませんでしたよ。ですが、その数千人の志願者も足りなかったようで…」
languages.original_text: "They were forming an {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} regiment on my planet. Thousands of morons bought the Commissars' groxshit about rations and the glorious duty that is protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I wasn't one of them, of course. However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは私がいた惑星に{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}の連隊を結成させようとしていました。配給を渡すだの、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}を守る輝かしい義務だの、コミッサーが吐く戯言を何千人もの愚か者が信じました。もちろん、私は信じませんでしたよ。ですが、その数千人の志願者も足りなかったようで…」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Estaban formando un regimiento del {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} en mi planeta. Miles de idiotas se tragaron la verborrea de los Comisarios sobre las raciones y el glorioso deber de proteger el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yo no estaba entre ellos, claro. Pero pronto fue evidente que no bastaba con esos miles de voluntarios».
languages.original_text: "They were forming an {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} regiment on my planet. Thousands of morons bought the Commissars' groxshit about rations and the glorious duty that is protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I wasn't one of them, of course. However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."

Pero pronto fue evidente que no bastaba con esos miles de voluntarios».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "They were forming an Astra Militarum regiment on my planet. Thousands of morons bought the Commissars' grox shit about rations and the glorious duty that is protecting the Imperium. I wasn't one of them, of course. However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."

languages.text: « Sur ma planète se formait un régiment de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. Des milliers d'abrutis ont gobé les histoires du commissaire sur les rations et l'honneur de protéger l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Évidemment, je n'en faisais pas partie. Mais très vite, ces milliers de volontaires se sont révélés insuffisants. »
languages.original_text: "They were forming an {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} regiment on my planet. Thousands of morons bought the Commissars' groxshit about rations and the glorious duty that is protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I wasn't one of them, of course. However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."

traits.locale_text: « Sur ma planète se formait un régiment de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. Des milliers d'abrutis ont gobé les histoires du commissaire sur les rations et l'honneur de protéger l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Évidemment, je n'en faisais pas partie. Mais très vite, ces milliers de volontaires se sont révélés insuffisants. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Auf meinem Planeten wurde ein Regiment des {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} gebildet. Tausende von Idioten glaubten die Grox-Scheiße des Kommissars über Rationen und die ruhmreiche Pflicht, das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} zu beschützen. Ich gehörte natürlich nicht dazu. Aber es stellte sich schon bald heraus, dass die Tausenden von Freiwilligen nicht ausreichten."
languages.original_text: "They were forming an {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} regiment on my planet. Thousands of morons bought the Commissars' groxshit about rations and the glorious duty that is protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I wasn't one of them, of course. However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."

traits.locale_text: "Auf meinem Planeten wurde ein Regiment des {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} gebildet. Tausende von Idioten glaubten die Grox-Scheiße des Kommissars über Rationen und die ruhmreiche Pflicht, das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} zu beschützen. Ich gehörte natürlich nicht dazu. Aber es stellte sich schon bald heraus, dass die Tausenden von Freiwilligen nicht ausreichten."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Gezegenimde bir {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} alayı kuruyorlardı. Binlerce beyinsiz, Komiserlerin kumanyalar ve {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'u{/g} korumanın ne kadar şanlı bir vazife olduğuna dair saçmalıklarına kandı. Ben elbette o saftiriklerden değildim ancak çok geçmeden, binlerce gönüllünün yeterli olmadığı görüldü."
languages.original_text: "They were forming an {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} regiment on my planet. Thousands of morons bought the Commissars' groxshit about rations and the glorious duty that is protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I wasn't one of them, of course. However, it soon turned out that those thousands of volunteers weren't enough."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegenimde bir {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} alayı kuruyorlardı. Binlerce beyinsiz, Komiserlerin kumanyalarla ve {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'u korumanın ne kadar şanlı bir vazife olduğuyla ilgili saçmalıklarına kandı. Ben elbette onlardan biri değildim ancak çok geçmeden belli oldu ki binlerce gönüllü yeterli değilmiş."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
